short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab page into a personalized, visually appealing and productive hub with Vivid Sparkles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking "Add to Chrome", You accept and agree to installing the Vivid Sparkles Chrome Extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. New Tab Search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.

Vivid Sparkles - the finest new tab page experience - unlocks the full power of your Chrome browser. Say goodbye to dull and uninteresting new tabs and welcome to a world of customized, aesthetically beautiful, and extremely productive options.

A beautifully designed calendar is at the core of the Vivid Sparkles experience, ready to help you keep track of all your key dates, appointments, and activities with ease. You'll always know what's coming up with a fast glimpse, freeing you up to concentrate on what truly important.

But that's only the start. Vivid Sparkles also contains a lightning-fast search bar, making it simple to discover what you're searching for on the internet. You'll never have to wonder what time it is again with a gorgeous clock.

Vivid Sparkles contains everything you need to take your browser experience to the next level, whether you're a busy professional, a student, or just someone searching for a more efficient and productive method to organise your day.

So, are you up for a new level of productivity and customisation? If still not sure, check our homepage to learn more - vividsparkles.net
